name: Caffe Greco
discription: In the steamy swirl of mornings embrace, A symphony of beans, a dance of graceBrewed with love, each sip a cozy place.

coffees.data: Espresso is a concentrated coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans. It is the base for many other coffee drinks.
coffees.description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans.
An espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy, topped with foamed milk.
coffees.data: Cappuccino is made with equal parts of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. It often has a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top.

coffees.description: A coffee-based dessert consisting of a scoop of vanilla gelato or ice cream topped or 'drowned' with a shot of hot espresso.
coffees.data: Affogato is a coffee-based dessert consisting of a scoop of vanilla gelato or ice cream topped with a shot of hot espresso.

name: Caffee Florian
discription: In the art of brewing, passion's flame ignites, Each bean a story, each cup a delight.From maker's hand to lips, a journey bright.

coffees.description: A very short shot of espresso coffee, typically served in a small cup.
coffees.data: Ristretto is a short shot of a more concentrated espresso, using the same amount of coffee but half the amount of water.

coffees.description: An espresso coffee drink with a small amount of milk, usually foamed.
coffees.data: Macchiato is an espresso with a small amount of steamed milk, typically just a dollop to mark the espresso.

coffees.description: A long espresso drink similar to an Americano, but with the ratio of coffee to water being much higher.
coffees.data: Lungo is an espresso made with more water, resulting in a larger, but less intense coffee than a traditional espresso.

name: Caffe Reggio
discription: In the heart of beans, secrets unfurl, A brew of comfort, in every swirl.For coffee makers, it's joy they hurl.

coffees.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.
coffees.data: Latte is made with a shot of espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small amount of milk foam.

coffees.description: A coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water.
coffees.data: Americano is made by diluting an espresso with hot water, giving it a similar strength to drip coffee but with a different flavor profile.

coffees.description: An espresso-based coffee drink consisting of espresso with macrofoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles and a glossy or velvety consistency).
coffees.data: Flat White is similar to a latte but uses microfoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles) and has a higher ratio of coffee to milk.

name: Caffe Sant Eustachio
discription: In the alchemy of beans, dreams awake,A potion brewed, for hearts to partake. For coffee makers, each moment a keepsake.

coffees.description: An espresso served with a slice of lemon.
coffees.data: Espresso Romano is an espresso served with a slice of lemon or lemon peel, which adds a unique citrus flavor.

coffees.description: A traditional Italian coffee made with espresso, hot chocolate, and whipped cream.
coffees.data: Gran Caffe is a larger espresso shot, typically made with more water to create a longer coffee experience.

coffees.description: An espresso-based coffee drink that includes cocoa powder and milk froth or whipped cream.
coffees.data: Maraschino is a coffee beverage that includes a shot of espresso mixed with maraschino liqueur.

name: Caf√© Regatta
discription: In the quiet hum of the coffee's song, A symphony of flavors, rich and strong. For coffee makers, where they belong.

coffees.description: A traditional Venetian coffee made with espresso, hot chocolate, and whipped cream.
coffees.data: Venetian Mocha is a chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, hot chocolate, and whipped cream.

coffees.description: An Italian coffee drink made of espresso, chocolate, and whole milk served layered in a small glass.
coffees.data: Bickering is a combination of espresso and hot chocolate, topped with a small amount of milk foam.

coffees.description: An espresso 'corrected' with a shot of liquor, usually grappa, brandy, or sambuca.
coffees.data: Caffe Cornetto is an Italian coffee drink that combines espresso with a small amount of frothed milk, served with a cornetto (Italian croissant).

name: Coffee Greco di Via Veneto
discription: With every pour, a ritual divine, In every cup, a sip of sunshine. For coffee makers, joy's sweet wine.

coffees.description: A coffee substitute made from ground roasted barley, commonly found in Italy.
coffees.data: Caffe Orzo is a caffeine-free coffee substitute made from roasted barley, prepared similarly to espresso.

coffees.description: An Italian coffee drink made of espresso, chocolate, and whole milk served layered in a small glass.
coffees.data: Bickering is a combination of espresso and hot chocolate, topped with a small amount of milk foam.

coffees.description: An espresso-based coffee drink that includes cocoa powder and milk froth or whipped cream.
coffees.data: Maraschino is a coffee beverage that includes a shot of espresso mixed with maraschino liqueur.
